appDeveloper: App Developer at VOMATEC Innovations GmbH
shCodingDescription: SH Coding is the sole proprietorship under which all of my software projects are published.
aboutMePart2: I have completed my Master of Science in Mobile Computing and am passionate about developing innovative digital solutions.
aboutMePart3: When I'm not coding, I dive into the fascinating world of Pokémon or explore the most beautiful hiking trails with my fiancée – always on the lookout for new adventures
aboutMePart4: In the gaming and developer community, I am usually known as HankeKun, both in games and on GitHub. Feel free to check it out!
